C�dric Beust wrote:
 > Here is a scenario I've seen happen fairly often:
 >
 > Write test1
 > Write code1
 > Write test2
 > Write code2
 >
 > Then a refactoring comes to mind and you realize you don't need code1
 > and code2 any more, so you write code3, and suddenly, you find
 > yourself having to refactor (or throw away) both test1 and test2.

Greetings C�dric,

I've not seen that happen often in practice (in fact, not in recent 
enough memory that I can recall). Can you provide an example?
